Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 96th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2019, off Braulio Escandon (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2019, off Thomas Bowling (HOU)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Traded from Baltimore to Houston on 7/25/2020 (Going to HOU: CF Irving Anderson. Going to BAL: P Ronald Rios, P Joseph Lindberg, P Joseph Loftis, RF Oscar Lopez)...
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
Hit for the cycle against Minnesota on 5/11/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2021, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
